comment.author: 77183687@N02
comment._content: HI,  I think this could be the Holy Faith Convent at Rosbercon, outside New Ross.  Margaret Aylward, the foundress was a Waterford woman and they had a foundation here called "St Joseph's."  As far as I know their other convents were around the Pale.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77183687@N02] That's great information, but I just want to check something with you. We have other photos definitely taken at Holy Faith, Rosbercon but they're later than this one and it's called Our Lady of Lourdes which didn't open until 1924. So was the convent called St. Joseph's originally, do you know, and was it open in 1915?
